user_query: I'm organizing a charity marathon in my city and I want to ensure it's an eco-friendly event. Can you calculate the carbon footprint for the fuel consumption of the event vehicles and provide tips on sustainable nutrition for the participants? Additionally, suggest some local hotels that prioritize environmental sustainability.

TaskList.description: Calculate the carbon footprint for the fuel consumption of the event vehicles based on the estimated mileage and fuel type.
Research and compile tips on sustainable nutrition for marathon participants, focusing on locally sourced and organic food options.
Identify local hotels that prioritize environmental sustainability and gather sustainability certifications or practices.
